identity_stable_set: Jiho is a part-time library assistant who opens the morning desk three days a week.
Jiho wants to become an archivist and is preparing for a certification exam.
Jiho values quiet routines, thoughtful conversation, and helping neighbors.

lifestyle_and_routine: Wake up at 6:30 AM, make pour-over coffee, and review one chapter of archival science notes.
Walk to the library around 8:20 AM and check returned books before opening.
Eat a light lunch near the square and read short essays during breaks.
Take a 20-minute evening walk and write a brief daily reflection before sleep.
current_plan_context: This week, Jiho is focused on finishing a cataloging practice workbook.
Jiho plans to ask Sujin about putting a small community reading flyer near the cafe counter.
